reviews.review: За час своей игры, я забыл слово читараз, хочешь поиграть без гандонов? ТЕБЕ СЮДА.
Esse jogo eh Bom, o ruin e so a movimentação Do Boneco !.

This is THE Counter Strike game. Though a rather old title compared to modern FPS games, like any Source engine game it holds up. The guns, as CS should, have spray patterns, yet they are rather conservative and the guns aim well if you can figure out how to control the spray, unlike CSGO with absurd spray patterns that make the game difficult and make the gameplay absurd. There is no "global ranking", the whole point of the game (publicly) is to just have fun. The userbase is small, but not so much it is a dead game, and most players are quiet or friendly unlike those in CSGO, in which a large, and now F2P userbase attracts more hackers and scammers. The graphics are a also a "step back" however I mean this in a good way. The game runs smoother on any system, and unlike modern FPS games with childish pop out graphics that try too hard to be realistic or "intense" and fail, the graphics are conservative, yet hold up and still look charming and not too archaic. Remember CSGO is just in a modified Source engine. Lastly no skins, no knifes, no agent skins or Operations, literally just gameplay. Overall if your gonna get into CS, just play this and avoid GO.

Really good game, it has really fun and playful gameplay, it does'nt lag on laptops, it's a really easy game most of the time and it's voice chat features are really good. it holds up pretty good even tho it is from 2004 i mean global offensive is'nt bad but this is pretty cool and it also is for 8,19€.
nice game for having fun non-competitively

¿Qué diablos es "among us"? Soy una madre preocupada con un niño de 13 años y estoy aquí para buscar ayuda con respecto a mi hijo. La semana pasada, cuando fuimos al supermercado, mi hijo señaló un bote de basura rojo y comenzó a saltar gritando "¡ESO ES UN AMONG US! ¡ESE BOTE DE BASURA ES SUS! ¡EL ROJO ES EL IMPOSTOR! " Tan pronto como hizo eso, el gerente nos dijo que nos fuéramos. Le dije que mi hijo estaba emocionado por algo y me disculpé. Pero el gerente todavía nos dijo que nos fuéramos, así que recogí el bote de basura rojo por el que mi hijo se estaba volviendo loco y se lo tiré a la cabeza. Entonces mi hijo gritó "DEAD BODY REPORTED". ¿Puede alguien decirme qué diablos le pasa?
